attributes.action: Start a petition for all animals to have a law and for there to be animal rights
attributes.background: Just want what is right for animals they should have rights like human rights there should be animals rights and a proper law enforced. Reason been in me doing this is I See all this pictures of animal cruelty and nothing being done just turning a blind eye. Hopefully we can get enough ppl for it.

rejection.details: We're not sure what your petition is asking Parliament to do. You could start a new petition which asks clearly and specifically for the change to the law that you would like to see.
